name: Blockchain Penetration Testing
description: Testing the security of blockchain networks and Web3 applications.

cards.title: Smart Contract Attack Simulation
cards.description: Using attack frameworks to simulate real-world exploits.
cards.summaryText: Demonstrate how Echidna, MythX, and Slither surface exploit paths and how Hardhat test harnesses reproduce them safely.

cards.title: Blockchain Network Vulnerability Assessments
cards.description: Analyzing consensus mechanisms and network security risks.
cards.bulletpoints: Sybil attacks, 51% attacks, DDoS threats on nodes
cards.summaryText: Explain how Sybil and 51% attacks emerge from weak consensus assumptions and outline node-hardening steps against DDoS.

cards.title: Web3 dApp Security Testing
cards.description: Identifying vulnerabilities in Web3 frontends and smart contract interactions.
cards.bulletpoints: Metamask phishing, API abuse, RPC endpoint security
cards.summaryText: Highlight phishing entry points in wallet flows, probe API and RPC misuse, and align fixes with least-privilege design.
